card

Class Advance2SqueezePlay

  • java.lang.Object
    • card.Card
      • card.Advance2SqueezePlay

  • public class Advance2SqueezePlay
extends Card
    This Class is a subclass of Card class that simply holds the fields String cardName, Player owner, int cardID, int typeID and boolean keepable for the instance of the class and has constructors, setters and getters for the fields specified above. It also has a applyCard method that overrides the main applyCard method in the main Card Class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Berk Kaan Kuguoglu
